name: Ada Lovelace
quote: That brain of mine is something more than merely mortal, as time will show.

name: Alan Turing
quote: Machines take me by surprise with great frequency.

name: Douglas Engelbart
quote: The digital revolution is far more significant than the invention of writing or even of printing.

name: Grace Hopper
quote: The most damaging phrase in the language is "Weâ€™ve always done it this way!".

name: Alan Kay
quote: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.

name: Jean Bartik
quote: I loved every minute of what I did. If you don't love what you do, what do you have?

name: Tim Berners-Lee
quote: Innovation is serendipity, so you don't know what people will make.

name: Margaret Hamilton
quote: There was no second chance. We all knew that.
